mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, TYPE, SIZE, UUID, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NOTE1, NOTE2
mapper.insert: insert into images (ID, TITLE, TYPE, SIZE, UUID, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NOTE1, NOTE2) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update images
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NOTE1 = #{note1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE2 = #{note2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
